casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Scott David ALLEN. No. 115A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 11, 2005. William N. Farrell, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of April 2005 by Defendant to Amend the Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of April 2005."
